channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IA

item.title: Report E-2023090744
item.description:
Report E-2023090744

Identified by scraper @ 2023-10-02T15:12:59+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-05
  • City: DES MOINES
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: CLEAN HARBORS ENVIRONMENTAL SERVICES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Driver was loading waste solvent at the location. While loading the middle compartment it overflowed releasing approximately 50 gallons on to the containment pad. The solvent was completely contained on the pad and was recovered back into the tank.

item.title: Report E-2023090702
item.description:
Report E-2023090702

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-27T18:15:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-26
  • City: DES MOINES
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the valve of the one 250 gallon metal tote of red kero 50 (un1993) had a mechanical failure and had released 16 ounces of product. Contractors were dispatched for the containment and cleanup of the release.

item.title: Report X-2023090253
item.description:
Report X-2023090253

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-27T18:15:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-26
  • City: SIOUX CITY
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The bottom of the bottle had a crack and leaked out on to the trailer floor, had the PH exit the trailer, cleaned up the spill and placed the package in a red tote with a lid. DescribePack: Bottom of the bottle cracked DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: placed in red tote

item.title: Report I-2023090111
item.description:
Report I-2023090111

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-26T18:14:26+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-23
  • City: Manchester
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: THREE RIVERS FS
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 6
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1-1450 Gallon NH3 tank ruptured at 2:OOPM Wednesday August 23,2023 at our Manchester FS Facility(location 1000 South 5th Street Manchester Iowa, 52057 while being stored. The end cap separated from the nurse tank causing a large cloud of NH3 to escape into the atmosphere. The cloud had dissipated withing 45 seconds. We determined the cause of this incident was tank failure.
